data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Canseco-Márquez, Luis, Ramírez-González, Cynthia G., Campbell, Jonathan A. (2018): Taxonomic review of the rare Mexican snake genus Chersodromus (Serpentes: Dipsadidae), with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 4399 (2): 151-169, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.2.1|12 occurrences
